name: Adventuring
comment: Showing the main view of world, for exploration, hero movement, town visits, random events, etc.

name: PlayerPerformingActions
comment: NPC or other players over the network are performing actions, such as moving hero, visiting town, etc.

comment: Showing the zoomed out world map, usually invoked by view-world related abilities.

comment: Showing the treasure map, invoked by VisitRelicObelisk, or ViewTreasureMap ability.

name: ViewingQuestLog

name: ViewingDiplomacy

name: ViewingObjectives
comment: When current user is checking objectives dialog.

name: ViewingScore
comment: When current user is checking score dialog.
